SEARCH
Package main.java.com.yourpackage.entities

Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
main.java.com.yourpackage.entities.Vertex
Direct Known Subclasses:
Anthill, Leaf, Stone
public class Vertex extends Object
Represents a Vertex, the main part of the graph representing the world of the Ants. Ants can move between vertices, collects larvae from them and fight on them

  • Constructor Details

    • Vertex

      public Vertex(int x, int y, int order, int idx, int larvae)
      Constructs a Vertex object with specified parameters and adds to it a label counting the amount of larvae on it
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinates of the Vertex
      y - The y-coordinates of the Vertex
      order - The order value of the Vertex
      idx - The index value in said order of the Vertex
      larvae - The amount of larvae in the Vertex
